    • createElection

      public void createElection(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, String electionId, Map<String,Long> results)
      Create an Election.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The Context.
      electionId - The id of the ElectionInfo and the Election.
      results - The initial results of the Election to create.

    • readOpenElection

      public String readOpenElection(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, String electionId)
      Return the Election information of electionId and affluence.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the Context.
      electionId - the id of the Election to retrieve open information (electionId and affluence).
      Returns:
      the String representing the Election serialized in order to get info about affluence.

    • readClosedElection

      public it.unibo.ds.chainvote.assets.Election readClosedElection(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, String electionId)
      Return the Election if it's already closed.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the Context.
      electionId - the id of the Election to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Election.
      Throws:
      org.hyperledger.fabric.shim.ChaincodeException - in case Election retrieved is still open.

    • castVote

      public void castVote(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, it.unibo.ds.chainvote.utils.Choice choice, String electionId)
      Cast a vote in an existing Election.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the Context. A transient map is expected with the following key-value pairs: UserCodeData.USER_ID and UserCodeData.CODE..
      choice - the Choice of the vote.
      electionId - the id of the Election where the vote is cast.

    • deleteElection

      public void deleteElection(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, String electionId)
      Delete an Election.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the Context.
      electionId - the id of the Election to delete.

      Returns:
      the Elections serialized.
